mapper.select: select title, regdate, viewCnt, userId from freeboard where bno > 0 order by regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from freeboard where bno > 0
select title, regdate, content, viewCnt, userId from freeboard where bno > 0 and bno = #{numCalc}
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (title, content, userId) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId});
mapper.update: update freeboard set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where bno = #{index}
mapper.select: select f.bno as num , m.userId, f.title, f.content, f.regdate, f.viewcnt from freeboard f left join membershiptable m on f.userId = m.userId where f.userId = #{userId} order by regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from freeboard where userId = #{userId}

select f.bno as num , m.userId, f.title, f.content, f.regdate, f.viewcnt from freeboard f left join membershiptable m on f.userId = m.userId where f.bno = #{num} and m.userId = #{userId} order by regdate desc
